title: Understanding Intellectual Developmental Disorder
text: Intellectual Developmental Disorder is characterized by limitations in intellectual functioning and adaptive behavior, which covers many everyday social and practical skills.

title: Key Characteristics
text: Consider the age of onset and the level of intellectual functioning when identifying Intellectual Developmental Disorder.

title: Defining Intellectual Functioning
text: What is the threshold IQ level that typically indicates limitations in intellectual functioning?

title: Age of Onset
text: At what age should the symptoms of Intellectual Developmental Disorder begin to appear?

title: Combining Characteristics
text: Combine the key characteristics of intellectual functioning and age of onset to define Intellectual Developmental Disorder.
